about.title: About Me
about.description:
Hey! ðŸ‘‹
I'm a Team Lead at DocuWare, and a Software Engineer at heart.

I believe in the power of teamwork and live by the motto: "If I made someone's life better, then it was worth it."
Whether it's a small feature or a complex project, I aim to ensure that everything we create makes a positive difference for both my colleagues and our customers.

I'm learning the ways of leading a team. Leadership is something I always enjoyed, as it allows me to impact the team's success and support my colleagues in achieving their professional and personal goals.

On the Software Engineering side, I have the most fun in frontend development, particularly with React, but I have always worked with full stack development, mostly with C# (and .NET), Microsoft SQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Over the years, I've also gained experience with CI/CD, automated pipelines, Infrastructure as Code, Terraform and Microsoft Azure.
